Class DBConnector

java.lang.Object
dao.DBConnector
public class DBConnector extends Object
Database connector and data access object (DAO) class. Provides methods to query, insert, and delete records for Mazes, Dispositions, Users, Questions, and Games.

  • Field Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description

    connection

  • Constructor Details

    • DBConnector

      public DBConnector(Connection connection)
      Constructs a DBConnector using an existing JDBC connection.
      Parameters:
      connection - the JDBC connection to the database

  • Method Details

    • deleteMaze

      public void deleteMaze(int mazeId)
      Deletes a maze from the database by its ID.
      Parameters:
      mazeId - the ID of the maze to delete

    • insertMaze

      public void insertMaze(Maze maze)
      Inserts a new maze into the database.
      Parameters:
      maze - the Maze object to insert; its ID will be set after insertion

    • insertDisposition

      public void insertDisposition(Disposition disposition)
      Inserts a disposition record into the database.
      Parameters:
      disposition - the Disposition object to insert; its ID will be set after insertion

    • insertDispositionMatrix

      public void insertDispositionMatrix(int coordX, int coordY, int dispositionId, int element)
      Inserts a cell into a disposition matrix in the database.
      Parameters:
      coordX - the x-coordinate of the cell
      coordY - the y-coordinate of the cell
      dispositionId - the ID of the disposition
      element - the element type (0=empty, 1=medkit, 2=crocodile, 3=wall)

    • loadDispositionMatrix

      public int[][] loadDispositionMatrix(int dispositionId, int width, int height)
      Loads the matrix of a disposition from the database.
      Parameters:
      dispositionId - the ID of the disposition
      width - matrix width
      height - matrix height
      Returns:
      2D integer matrix representing the disposition

    • queryDispositions

      public ResultSet queryDispositions(int mazeId)
      Queries all dispositions for a given maze.
      Parameters:
      mazeId - the maze ID
      Returns:
      ResultSet containing all dispositions

    • insertUser

      public User insertUser(String userName, String password)
      Inserts a new user into the database.
      Parameters:
      userName - the user's name
      password - the user's password
      Returns:
      the created User object with its generated ID

    • queryUser

      public ResultSet queryUser(String user, String password)
      Queries a user by name and password.
      Parameters:
      user - username
      password - password
      Returns:
      ResultSet containing the matching user

    • getQuestions

      public List<Question> getQuestions()
      Retrieves all questions from the database.
      Returns:
      list of Question objects

    • insertGame

      public void insertGame(int userId, int mazeId, int dispositionId, boolean victory, int health, int correctQuestions, int wrongQuestions, int points, String time)
      Inserts a new game result into the database.
      Parameters:
      userId - ID of the user
      mazeId - ID of the maze
      dispositionId - ID of the disposition
      victory - whether the user won
      health - user's remaining health
      correctQuestions - number of correct answers
      wrongQuestions - number of wrong answers
      points - total points earned
      time - time taken as string (e.g., "02:30")

    • getTop10

      public ResultSet getTop10(int mazeId, int dispositionId)
      Retrieves the top 10 players for a maze and disposition based on points.
      Parameters:
      mazeId - ID of the maze
      dispositionId - ID of the disposition
      Returns:
      ResultSet of top 10 game results

    • queryData

      public ResultSet queryData(String table, int id)
      Queries a table by ID.
      Parameters:
      table - table name
      id - ID value
      Returns:
      ResultSet of the query

    • queryAll

      public ResultSet queryAll(String table)
      Queries all records from a table.
      Parameters:
      table - table name
      Returns:
      ResultSet of all records
